content: drops 168-1 drops design pattern no r-689 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- size s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl materials drops muskat from garnstudio 350-400-450-500-550-600 g color no 20 light mint drops double pointed needles and circular needle 60 or 80 cm / 24 or 32 size 4 mm/us 6 - or size needed to get 21 sts x 28 row in stockinette st and 17 sts x 28 row in lace pattern = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm
